string.value: Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.
My goodness! My goodness! Always so busy.

Kekeke! I knew from the moment you spoke that you would be lending me a hand. Aren't you curious to know what your task would be? If you help me, out of the graciousness of your big heart, I may be able to give you something that you'll find useful--in the name of the Witch Malady!
Talk to me if you want to know more about the things you can do for me.
How dare you refuse a witch? You're either foolish or really brave. Ha! I'll let you go this time...
